# creating a the registration table

CREATE TABLE register (
	ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
	Reg_ID TEXT NOT NULL,
	Face_array TEXT
);

# An example insert command 
# See updating_register_table.py

INSERT INTO register (Reg_ID, Face_array) VALUES ("RA1711004040028", "-0.17727292 0.18272902 0.04985122 -0.05555863 -0.09110010 -0.06743199 -0.03908748 -0.18007499 0.12545851 -0.05854478 0.22128126 0.03879029 -0.19107492 -0.17627594 0.00530151 0.13150929 -0.16706736 -0.18426900 -0.05436963 -0.04601240 0.01451282 -0.03879740 0.02219818 0.11642164 -0.10557583 -0.34617925 -0.06964497 -0.11797160 0.09495009 -0.05094969 -0.03509312 0.00370281 -0.22764607 -0.03443814 -0.03237709 0.08275776 0.00749473 -0.00176960 0.18135729 0.02301186 -0.15039292 -0.00760902 -0.03588293 0.26857984 0.17629240 -0.00227069 0.07999681 -0.04567032 0.05622926 -0.20491184 0.05143515 0.12875806 0.13207160 -0.02029354 0.03640912 -0.19371976 -0.04516619 0.02489620 -0.22234558 0.05590645 0.02770660 -0.10991246 -0.12524603 -0.09088239 0.27054390 0.15814371 -0.09998487 -0.08698891 0.24770200 -0.14387222 -0.00422043 -0.00553924 -0.06612477 -0.11921509 -0.28083286 0.05897510 0.35249537 0.18333018 -0.22758767 0.02942284 -0.17160161 0.01961277 -0.01606099 -0.00885195 -0.15073420 0.08234545 -0.11124174 0.05302406 0.13085671 0.01633681 0.02417322 0.24104510 0.02721218 0.04718801 0.06521324 -0.04068446 -0.06568657 -0.06007148 -0.13081655 -0.00735058 0.01700064 -0.12899569 0.06372241 0.07600859 -0.19410548 0.09386390 0.04294977 -0.03613368 -0.03584474 0.07627910 -0.15104108 -0.10036507 0.15712583 -0.22134775 0.25319040 0.18922688 0.04594870 0.16325992 0.10335103 0.06180301 -0.04518711 -0.07686146 -0.05621163 -0.05473464 0.08860129 -0.09390751 0.08379299 0.08164944");
